links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (5,-4,1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 1, 3]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 5*Self(n-1)-4*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 18 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
